SEARCH
Package Pages

Class TermsOfServicePanel

java.lang.Object
Pages.TermsOfServicePanel
public class TermsOfServicePanel extends Object
The TermsOfServicePanel class in the Pages package is responsible for creating and managing a Terms of Service.

This class allows for the display of the ToS. It includes methods to create a dialog box that displays the ToS content, formatted as HTML. The class is designed to ensure that users can easily access,read, and understand the terms and conditions.

Key features of the TermsOfServicePanel class include:

  • Construction of a modal dialog box that contains the Terms of Service text.
  • Use of a JTextPane to display the ToS content, formatted in HTML.

The class ensures that the dialog box is modal and anchored to a parent JFrame, focusing user attention on the ToS and preventing interaction with the main application window until the dialog is closed.

  • Method Details

    • createTermsOfServiceDialog

      public static JDialog createTermsOfServiceDialog(JFrame frame)
      Initializes and returns a modal dialog that presents the Terms of Service for the Cruise Booking System.

      This method creates a JDialog containing the text of the Terms of Service, with the content formatted as HTML. The dialog is composed of the following elements:

      • A JTextPane that displays the Terms of Service text. The content includes various sections such as user conduct guidelines, limitations of liability, and acceptance of terms, all formatted in HTML.
      • A JScrollPane that allows users to scroll through the terms efficiently.

      The dialog is set to be modal and is anchored to the provided JFrame, ensuring it remains in focus until closed by the user. The JTextPane is configured to be non-editable.

      Parameters:
      frame - the parent JFrame to which the dialog is attached
      Returns:
      a JDialog containing the Terms of Service
